channel.title: faq on Turing Machines Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in faq on Turing Machines Documentation

item.title: FAQ
item.description: 1. What can I do with the board? Edge gateway and application hosting Homelab Develop and learn cloud-native technologies (Kubernetes, Docker, Serverless, Microservices) on bare metal Cloud-native apps testing environment Learn concepts of distributed Machine Learning apps Hosting and managing IoT apps Prototype and learn cluster applications, parallel computing, and distributed computing concepts on bare metal Host Minecraft 2. Which Raspberry Pi models are compatible? Turing Pi supports the following models with and without eMMC
